Headline: Enhance & Build Your Reputation With Best PR Agency in India
ShortDescription: Column Inches is a full-service PR agency in Delhi, driven by women. With a deep understanding of media and marketing communications, we leverage our vast expertise in creating brand value for clients across sectors.
enhanced_description: Column Inches, established in 2015 and headquartered in Gurgaon, Haryana, operates as an independent, full-service PR firm. While its core focus is on building and enhancing external brand reputation for clients across various sectors through strategic media and marketing communications, it also extends its expertise to support key HR objectives. The firm aims to improve employee happiness and engagement by assisting clients in communicating, engaging, and building relationships with their internal stakeholders, akin to services provided by employee engagement platforms. Known for its boutique, nimble, and highly process-driven approach, Column Inches focuses on delivering consistent results and fostering trust and credibility for both external brands and internal employee relations. Its services are particularly relevant to talent management, including areas like employee recognition, employee engagement surveys, and internal brand building related to talent acquisition and diversity.
